      • getNextDirection

        public static char getNextDirection(char currentHeading,
                    char turn)
        Gets the resultant heading given a current heading and a direction to turn.
        Parameters:
        currentHeading - A char representing the current heading, either 'N', 'S', 'E' or 'W'
        turn - A char representing the direction to turn, either 'L' or 'R'
        Returns:
        A char representing the resultant direction from the given turn, either 'N', 'S', 'E' or 'W'.
